item.description:
Â 

Please join us as we prepare for our Winter Session for learning to line dance. At the open house we will learn a bunch of the "steps" used in line dance while we learn a few of the basic dances for the person just starting. Wear shoes that will not stick and bring a sweater or jacket. When we are dancing it is warm but during lessons it may be chilly. Plenty of easy and safe parking. We will be dancing on the second floor hardwood floors. A reminder that all beverages including water must be purchased from The Claddagh Pub. For any questions call me at 9782735726 or e me at dancingbob@hotmail.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Takes place in the upstairs floor (2nd fl)
item.name: Open House For Line Dance Introduction
